1352580.name: Coloring Pixels - Safari Pack
1352580.description:
Safari Book

This Safari Book adds 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Grab your binoculars and put on your sun hat - we're going on a Safari tour with this Book to see all of your favourite animals!

Contents

The Safari book unlocks the following images:
  • Meerkat - 36x48
  • Marabou Stork - 75x133
  • Flamingo & Vulture - 87x102
  • Lion - 91x99
  • African Big Cats - 93x31
  • Shady Characters - 100x60
  • Wild Variety - 100x62
  • Camel - 100x100
  • Hippo & Giraffe - 135x100
  • Watering Hole - 140x95
  • Rhinoceros - 145x65
  • Zebra & Cheetah - 160x83
  • Unlikely Trio - 168x168
  • Safari Car - 174x89
  • Ostrich & Crocodile - 175x100
  • Elephants - 178x125
  • Savannah Sunset - 200x140
  • Lone Giraffe - 200x150
  • African Plains - 200x180
  • Lion Pride - 220x135
